list please reply to Tour almergolfcom with the word ADD in the Subject line and include the new email address You can now book your reservation online at Refer a group of guests or more for a golf event or a holiday party in our newly enclosed pavilion and receive a gift certificate to Tour The group must book their event between September and October The event must take place before December Once the event is complete we will present you with a gift certificate Offer not valid for groups booked before or after special promotion window listed above and gift certificates will not be issued for events that cancel or drop below the playerguest minimum It is really that easy If you have any questions or you are ready to refer a group please Contact Kim Inman for tournament and event booking details ext or Umbrella Club As an Umbrella Club member you will receive another level of savings and advantages including discounts during peak season when email discount may not be available
